entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow level rising to 500 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Snow level 500 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
